name.en: Transnational Corporations and  Foreign  Direct Investment

department.ch: 產業經濟研究所碩士班

goal.ch: “This course will assess the role of foreign direct investment (FDI) in the world economy, and examine the political, economic, cultural, and legal dimensions of both inward and outward bound FDI. The topics will include the theories of FDI and multinational enterprises, the causes and consequences of FDI and the strategies used to enter international markets.“
goal.en: “This course will assess the role of foreign direct investment (FDI) in the world economy, and examine the political, economic, cultural, and legal dimensions of both inward and outward bound FDI.
